description:
Though the recording for Phantom is going well, Yumiko`s not happy with her own acting. And now she has to participate in an event that pits her and Yuhi against Mekuru and Otome. The prize is enticing, but the first game is to confess your love?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuhi and Yasumi and Mekuru and Otome
Yuuhi to Yasumi to Mekuru to Otome
夕陽とやすみとめくると乙女
